Title: Basics of Selling Techniques
Short Description: Foundational selling techniques
Full Description: Foundational selling techniques Overview:Equip participants with foundational selling techniques to improve their effectiveness in sales conversations and client interactions.Target Audience:Employees with up to 6 years of experience is direct sales.Course Content:Day 1: Understanding Customer Service FundamentalsWelcome and IntroductionObjective: To set expectations for the workshop, overview of the importance of the selling in business.Understanding the Sales ProcessObjectives: To define the 7 steps of the sales process and the difference between transactional and consultative sales.Building rapport and understanding customer needsObjective: To know how to build a rapport and how to get to the customer need professionally.Product needs and value propositionObjective: To understand the importance of product knowledge and how to create accordingly the value proposition.Present Solutions and Overcome ObjectionsObjective: To know how to tailor your presentation to meet customer needs.Close the SalesObjective: To recognize the signs that the customer is ready to buy and overcome “last-minute”Follow-Up and Maintain Customer RelationshipsObjective: To know how to build a long-term relationship and check on customer satisfaction.Final Review and EvaluationObjective: To consolidate learning and gather feedback on the workshop.

Title: Strengths Based Coaching
Short Description: Talent development and empowerment
Full Description: Talent development and empowerment Overview:Strength-based coaching focuses on identifying and leveraging individuals’ strengths to maximise performance, engagement, and personal growth. This training introduces leaders in Saudi Arabia to the principles and practices of strength-based coaching, aligning with the Kingdom’s emphasis on talent development and empowerment under Vision 2030.The workshop equips participants with the skills to identify strengths within their teams, create an empowering environment, and coach employees toward achieving their full potential. The training incorporates practical frameworks and real-world examples to demonstrate how leaders can use a strength-based approach to enhance employee performance, motivation, and engagement.Learning Outcomes:Understand the fundamentals of strength-based coaching and its benefits.Identify their own strengths and learn how to recognise strengths in others.Apply coaching techniques that empower individuals and foster growth.Develop strategies to integrate strength-based coaching into daily leadership practices.Course Content:Ch 1: Identifying Strengths in Leadership & Employee DevelopmentCh 2: Coaching with a Strength-Based ApproachCh 3: Building Strength-Based TeamsCh 4: Integration into Leadership Practice

Title: Women Entrepreneurship
Short Description: Succeed in the dynamic business landscape
Full Description: Succeed in the dynamic business landscape Overview:With the growing emphasis on female empowerment and economic participation in, women entrepreneurship is emerging as a key driver of innovation and economic growth. This training provides aspiring and current women entrepreneurs with the tools, confidence, and insights needed to succeed in the dynamic business landscape.The Workshop is designed to inspire and equip women with the mindset, skills, and strategies to launch and grow their own businesses. The training covers the unique challenges and opportunities for women entrepreneurs in Saudi Arabia, focusing on practical insights and real-world applications.Learning Outcomes:Identify and develop a viable business idea aligned with their skills and market demands.Gain basic knowledge of resource management, including funding and operational planning.Learn strategies to navigate challenges unique to women entrepreneurs.Build confidence to pursue entrepreneurial ventures and leverage networks for growth.Course Content:Ch 1: Identifying Business Opportunities and IdeasCh 2: Building a Strong Foundation for SuccessCh 3: Overcoming Barriers and Leveraging NetworksCh 4: Fostering a Growth Mindset

Title: Strategic Planning
Short Description: Develop and implement strategic plans
Full Description: Develop and implement strategic plans Overview:Strategic planning aligns organisational goals with a rapidly evolving business environment. This training focuses on equipping leaders in Saudi Arabia with the tools and techniques to develop, implement, and adjust strategic plans effectively.Develop a Strategic Mindset to lead teams with this two-hour session. It introduces participants to the essentials of strategic planning within a leadership context. Through a blend of theory and practical application, participants will learn to define objectives, analyse internal and external factors, and set actionable priorities for long-term success.Learning Outcomes:Understand the key elements of strategic planning and their relevance to leadership.Analyse internal and external factors influencing strategic decisions.Learn techniques to set clear, measurable objectives aligned with organisational goals.Build strategies that prioritise adaptability and resilience.Course Content:Ch 1: Aligning strategic planning with organisational transformationCh 2: Key components of a strategic planCh 3: Analysing Internal and External EnvironmentsCh 4: Designing, Implementing and Monitoring Strategic Plans

Title: Professional Plans
Short Description: Design dashboards and professional plans
Full Description: Design dashboards and professional plans Overview:With Leadership Dashboards and Professional Plans, design clear, actionable dashboards and well-structured professional plans to track performance, set goals, and drive strategic outcomes.This two-hour training introduces participants to the fundamentals of creating and utilising leadership dashboards and professional development plans. The session focuses on defining key performance indicators (KPIs), integrating data insights, and building actionable strategies for success. Participants will engage in practical exercises to design dashboards and plans that reflect their unique leadership roles and responsibilities.Learning Outcomes:Understand the purpose and components of a leadership dashboard.Identify and define key performance indicators (KPIs) relevant to their roles.Develop professional plans that align with organisational and personal growth objectives.Learn techniques to monitor progress and adapt plans to changing circumstances.Course Content:Ch 1: How dashboards and plans align with VisionCh 2: Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and MetricsCh 3: Designing Leadership DashboardsCh 4: Crafting and Implementing Professional Development Plans

Title: Adaptive Leadership
Short Description: Lead through change
Full Description: Lead through change Overview:The practice of adaptive leadership equips professionals with the ability to navigate uncertainty, lead through change, and solve complex challenges, in order to help leaders foster adaptability, resilience, and strategic foresight in alignment with Vision 2030’s focus on innovation and transformation.Introducing the principles and practices of adaptive leadership, this workshop aims to empower participants to respond effectively to rapidly changing business landscapes. Through engaging discussions and practical activities, attendees will learn to distinguish technical problems from adaptive challenges, build collective intelligence, and lead their teams with flexibility and clarity.Learning Outcomes:Understand the key principles of adaptive leadership.Differentiate between technical and adaptive challenges.Develop strategies for mobilising teams during uncertainty and change.Build skills to foster collaboration, innovation, and resilience in their teams.Apply adaptive leadership concepts to organisational and cultural transformation efforts.Course Content:Ch 1: Importance of Adaptive LeadershipCh 2: Understanding Adaptive vs. Technical ChallengesCh 3: Leading Through Change and UncertaintyCh 4: Applying Adaptive Leadership Principles

Title: Entrepreneurial Thinking
Short Description: Embraces creativity, resilience, and innovation
Full Description: Embraces creativity, resilience, and innovation Overview:This training is designed to help professionals and leaders in Saudi Arabia develop a mindset that embraces creativity, resilience, innovation, and a solutions-oriented approach to challenges to drive personal and organizational growth, aligning with Vision 2030’s emphasis on fostering innovation and entrepreneurship.The workshop introduces participants to the core principles of entrepreneurial thinking. It emphasizes identifying opportunities, problem-solving, and cultivating innovative ideas that add value.Learning Outcomes:Understand the fundamentals of entrepreneurial thinking and its relevance to various roles.Identify opportunities for innovation within their organizations or industries.Develop problem-solving skills using creative and practical approaches.Cultivate a proactive mindset to take calculated risks and embrace change.Course Content:Ch 1: Characteristics of an Entrepreneurial MindsetCh 2: Identifying Opportunities and Problem-SolvingCh 3: Strategic Risk-Taking and AdaptabilityCh 4: Applying Entrepreneurial Thinking

Title: Elevate Your Online Presence
Short Description: Digital marketing strategies
Full Description: Digital marketing strategies Overview:This workshop introduces digital marketing, specifically designed for beginners. It covers essential concepts and strategies needed to effectively market a business online. The Digital Marketing for Beginners course is a comprehensive introduction to the world of online marketing. Over the course of 1 hour and 30 minutes, participants will learn the basics of digital marketing, including understanding various social media platforms, how they work, why to use them, and how to identify and target their audience. This course is designed to provide practical knowledge that can be immediately applied to enhance the online presence of small businesses.Learning Outcomes:Understand the fundamentals of digital marketing.Learn about different social media platforms and how they work.Discover why certain platforms are suitable for specific business goals.Develop skills to identify and target the right audience for their business.Learn how to create and manage effective social media campaigns.Course Content:Ch 1: Introduction to DigitalMarketingWhat is digital marketing?Importance of digital marketing for businesses.Ch 2: Understanding Social Media PlatformsOverview of popular social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.).How each platform works and its unique features.Why businesses should use each platform.Ch 3: Identifying and Targeting Your AudienceUnderstanding target audience demographics.Tools and techniques to identify your target audience.Strategies for targeting the right audience on different platforms.Ch 4: Creating Effective Social Media CampaignsPlanning and setting goals for social media campaigns.Tips for creating engaging and effective content.Measuring and analyzing the success of your campaigns.

Title: Metaphors of Business Organisation
Short Description: A review of meta-cognitive structure
Full Description: A review of meta-cognitive structure Overview:A review of how the meta-cognitive structures of business affect business structure and performanceLearning Outcomes:An understanding of how metaphors influence business strategyCourse Content:Ch 1: An introduction to Metaphoric and Idiomatic Communication in BusinessCh 2: Businesses that are constructedCh 3: Businesses that floatCh 4: Businesses that growCh 5. Ones to avoid: Businesses that kill

Title: Sales Training Program
Short Description: Essential sales strategies
Full Description: Essential sales strategies Overview:A comprehensive 90-minute session focused on equipping participants with essential sales strategies, effective communication skills, and techniques to close deals successfully. This course introduces fundamental and advanced sales concepts, blending theoretical insights with practical applications. Participants will engage in interactive activities designed to enhance persuasion and negotiation skills, ultimately driving better sales performance.Learning Outcomes:Understand key sales processes and techniques.Develop strong relationship-building strategies.Enhance communication and active listening skills.Implement proven methods to overcome objections and close deals.Course Content:Ch 1: Understanding the Sales ProcessCh 2: Building Rapport and Trust with ClientsCh 3: Effective Communication and Active ListeningCh 4: Handling Objections and Closing Techniques

Title: Presentation Skills Training Program
Short Description: Boost confidence and refine the presentation skills
Full Description: Boost confidence and refine the presentation skills Overview:A practical 90-minute session designed to boost confidence and refine the presentation skills of participants. The focus is on clear communication, audience engagement, and effective delivery techniques. Participants will learn how to structure presentations, use body language effectively, and engage the audience with impactful storytelling. Interactive exercises will allow participants to practice and receive feedback on their presentation style.Learning Outcomes:Master the art of structuring presentations.Enhance public speaking and body language techniques.Engage audiences and maintain their interest.Manage presentation anxiety and handle Q&A sessions confidently.Course Content:Ch 1: Crafting a Compelling PresentationCh 2: Mastering Verbal and Non-Verbal CommunicationCh 3: Engaging the Audience EffectivelyCh 4: Handling Q&A and Presentation Anxiety

Title: Leadership Training Program
Short Description: Developing essential leadership skills
Full Description: Developing essential leadership skills Overview:A dynamic 90-minute session aimed at developing essential leadership skills, focusing on motivating teams, effective decision-making, and conflict resolution strategies. This training provides participants with tools and techniques to lead teams effectively, foster a collaborative environment, and handle challenges with confidence. Through interactive case studies and roleplays, participants will practice real-world leadership scenarios.Learning Outcomes:Develop key leadership qualities and styles.Motivate and inspire teams for higher productivity.Make informed decisions and resolve conflicts efficiently.Enhance communication and team management skills.Course Content:Ch 1: Introduction to Leadership StylesCh 2: Motivation and Team BuildingCh 3: Effective Decision-MakingCh 4: Conflict Resolution and Communication

Through interactive case studies and roleplays, participants will practice real-world leadership scenarios.Learning Outcomes:Develop key leadership qualities and styles.Motivate and inspire teams for higher productivity.Make informed decisions and resolve conflicts efficiently.Enhance communication and team management skills.Course Content:Ch 1: Introduction to Leadership StylesCh 2: Motivation and Team BuildingCh 3: Effective Decision-MakingCh 4: Conflict Resolution and Communication

Title: Self-Confidence
Short Description: Maintaining a positive state in challenging times
Full Description: Maintaining a positive state in challenging times Overview:This course focuses on building self-confidence through understanding and managing thoughts, emotions, and physiology, fostering authenticity, and maintaining a positive state in challenging times.Learning Outcomes:Gain control over emotional and mental states.Understand the connection between thoughts and physical responses.Learn strategies to manage thoughts and emotions effectively.Embrace authenticity for self-trust and confidence.Course Content:Ch 1: The Power of Choosing Your StateCh 2: Thoughts and Physiology ConnectionCh 3: Managing Thoughts and EmotionsCh 4: Being True and Authentic

Title: Interview Skills
Short Description: Leave a lasting positive impression
Full Description: Leave a lasting positive impression Overview:This course prepares participants for successful interviews by focusing on personal presentation, building rapport, and answering questions authentically while leaving a lasting positive impression.Learning Outcomes:Learn appropriate dress codes for interviews.Master rapport-building techniques and sensory acuity.Answer questions strategically and effectively.Embrace authenticity to stand out in interviews.Course Content:Ch 1: Dress CodeCh 2: Rapport and Sensory AcuityCh 3: Answering Questions SmartlyCh 4: The Magic of Being Yourself

Title: Imagineering Strategy Workshop
Short Description: A creative problem-solving framework
Full Description: A creative problem-solving framework Overview:This workshop introduces participants to Disney’s Imagineering Strategy, a creative problem-solving framework involving three perspectives: the Dreamer, the Realist, and the Critic. Participants will learn how to apply these roles to transform visions into actionable plans while addressing potential challenges.Learning Outcomes:Understand the roles of the Dreamer, the Realist, and the Critic in the creative process.Develop strategies to turn ideas into practical plans.Learn to identify and address potential risks and challenges.Explore the concept of reverse planning to reflect and refine strategies.Course Content:Ch 1: Introduction to ImagineeringCh 2: The Dreamer: Vision and OpportunitiesCh 3: The Realist: Planning and ExecutionCh 4: The Critic: Evaluation and Risk ManagementCh 5: Reverse Planning: Learning from the Future

Title: Goal Setting
Short Description: Set and achieve meaningful goals
Full Description: Set and achieve meaningful goals Overview:This course teaches participants how to set and achieve meaningful goals by distinguishing between states and goals, specifying outcomes, overcoming barriers, and taking effective action.Learning Outcomes:Differentiate between states and goals.Define and specify actionable outcomes.Use reflective questioning to uncover success strategies.Identify drivers and barriers to action.Develop and execute an action plan effectively.Course Content:Ch 1: Difference Between States and GoalsCh 2: Specifying Your OutcomeCh 3: Questioning for SuccessCh 4: Ready, Set, ACTION!

Title: Update Your Life Workshop
Short Description: Create positive change
Full Description: Create positive change Overview:This workshop focuses on empowering participants to take control of their lives through practical tools and strategies. Participants will learn how to redefine their goals, overcome limiting beliefs, and implement actionable steps to create positive change in various aspects of their personal and professional lives.Learning Outcomes:Identify and overcome limiting beliefs that hinder growth.Develop clarity on personal and professional goals.Learn practical strategies to enhance focus and productivity.Build resilience and adaptability for life’s challenges.Course Content:Ch 1: Introduction to Life Updates and Mindset ShiftsCh 2: Recognizing and Challenging Limiting BeliefsCh 3: Goal Setting and Vision CreationCh 4: Building Habits for Sustainable GrowthCh 5: Managing Stress and Enhancing Focus

Full Description: Enhance pitching skills Overview:This workshop equips participants with NLP techniques to enhance their pitching skills. Title: How People Tick (Metaprograms Workshop)
Short Description: Enhance leadership, teamwork, and personal development
Full Description: Enhance leadership, teamwork, and personal development Overview:This workshop explores metaprograms mental frameworks that influence behavior, decision-making, and communication. By understanding these patterns, participants can enhance their leadership, teamwork, and personal development strategies.Learning Outcomes:Understand the concept and application of metaprograms in different contexts.Identify personality traits, motivation patterns, and decision-making styles.Explore working styles, stress responses, and approaches to collaboration.Apply metaprogram insights to therapy, sales, recruiting, and team building.Course Content:Ch 1: Introduction to MetaprogramsCh 2: Personality Traits and BehaviorCh 3: Motivation Patterns and Decision-MakingCh 4: Working Styles and Stress ResponsesCh 5: Communication Styles: Inferential vs. LiteralCh 6: Proactive vs. Reactive Behaviors in Problem SolvingCh 7: Towards vs. Away Motivation and Goal SettingCh 8: Internal vs. External Motivation and FeedbackCh 9: Options vs. Procedures in Decision-MakingCh 10: Sameness vs. Difference: Preferences for ChangeCh 11: Convincer Strategies: How People Validate DecisionsCh 12: Applying Metaprograms to Leadership and Team Building

Title: Rethinking Problem Solving
Short Description: Explores the essence of problem solving
Full Description: Explores the essence of problem solving Overview:This workshop explores the essence of problem-solving by examining the brain’s role in problem creation, identifying problem structures, and taking appropriate steps to address them. Participants will learn proactive strategies and how to seek support effectively.Learning Outcomes:Understand the brain’s role in creating problems.Identify the structural source of a problem.Distinguish between reactive and proactive problem-solving approaches.Recognize different levels of problems and the support needed for resolution.Course Content:Ch 1: Understanding the Brain and ProblemsCh 2: Logical Levels and Problem StructureCh 3: Proactive vs. Reactive Problem SolvingCh 4: Seeking Support and Effective Help

Full Description: Practical strategies to optimize productivity Overview:This workshop is designed to help participants regain focus, overcome distractions, and combat limiting beliefs. Title: How Do You Eat a Whale
Short Description: Create actionable steps for achieving success
Full Description: Create actionable steps for achieving success Overview:This workshop focuses on understanding procrastination, its root causes, and practical strategies to overcome it. Participants will learn techniques to set clear goals, leverage personal values for motivation, and create actionable steps for achieving success.Learning Outcomes:Define procrastination and identify its causes.Recognize personal time-wasting habits and how to address them.Understand how fear and lack of commitment influence procrastination.Develop strategies to set clear goals and use values to stay motivated.Course Content:Ch 1: What is Procrastination?Ch 2: Why Does Procrastination Happen?Ch 3: Strategies to Overcome ProcrastinationCh 4: Goal Setting and Motivation Through Values

Title: Stress Management & Resilience
Short Description: Manage stress in personal and professional lives
Full Description: Manage stress in personal and professional lives Overview:This course focuses on equipping participants with practical strategies and techniques to effectively manage stress in their personal and professional lives, fostering resilience and productivity. Participants will explore the impact of stress on physical and mental health, learn coping strategies, and develop resilience-building techniques. The course also addresses enhancing productivity through stress assessment and effective communication.Learning Outcomes:Understand the impact of stress on health and productivity.Apply tools and techniques for stress reduction.Build personal and professional resilience.Identify strategies to enhance productivity through stress assessment.Course Content:Recognizing Signs and Symptoms of StressTools for Stress ReductionBuilding a Resilient SystemPracticing Effective Communication

Title: Customer Experience Excellence
Short Description: Strategies to deliver exceptional customer experiences
Full Description: Strategies to deliver exceptional customer experiences Overview:Focused on sectors like retail, banking, and hospitality, this course empowers participants with strategies to deliver exceptional customer experiences, emphasizing actionable tools and employee empowerment. Participants will explore customer journey mapping, critical touchpoints, and feedback mechanisms to enhance satisfaction and loyalty.Learning Outcomes:Identify customer needs and expectations.Map critical touchpoints to improve experiences.Implement effective feedback mechanisms.Empower teams for exceptional service delivery.Course Content:Understanding Customer NeedsMapping Customer JourneysDesigning Customer-Centric CulturesImplementing Feedback Mechanisms

Title: Beyond Emotional Intelligence
Short Description: Foundational principles that multiply its impact
Full Description: Foundational principles that multiply its impact Overview:This course provides practical tools for holistic living and leadership development, extending beyond Emotional Intelligence to foundational principles that multiply its impact. Participants will explore foundational quotients of success, strategies to make EI concepts practical in daily life, and techniques for achieving a balance between personal and professional growth.Learning Outcomes:Understand why Emotional Intelligence alone is not sufficient.Learn foundational quotients of success and how to apply them.Develop strategies to make EI concepts actionable in daily life.Strike a balance in life while enhancing leadership capabilities.Course Content:Quotients of LifeFoundations of Emotional IntelligenceCompounding EI with Significant PrinciplesEnhancing Agility with Social Awareness

Title: Positive Education (Teachers & Educators)
Short Description: Positive psychology to nurture well-being
Full Description: Positive psychology to nurture well-being Overview:Positive Education focuses on integrating traditional education with positive psychology to nurture well-being, resilience, and academic success. This course is designed to provide teachers and educators with tools to implement positive education principles effectively. This course equips educators with skills to promote well-being and resilience in students, combining character development and practical education strategies relevant to the Middle Eastern context.Learning Outcomes:Understand the principles of Positive Education, particularly in a cultural context.Build positive relationships in classrooms through empathy and trust.Nurture students’ strengths and integrate character education.Foster well-being, emotional intelligence, and positive mindsets.Develop effective classroom management and positive disciplinary techniques.Adapt Positive Education for cultural relevance.Course Content:Introduction to Positive EducationPrinciples and applicationsLinking well-being and academic successCultivating Positive RelationshipsTeacher-student dynamicsPeer relationships and teamworkStrengths-Based LearningIdentifying strengths and talentsCurriculum integration strategies

Title: Leadership Development
Short Description: Practical insights with action-oriented strategies
Full Description: Practical insights with action-oriented strategies Overview:This course combines practical insights with action-oriented strategies, focusing on leadership development to help participants inspire, innovate, and achieve organizational success. This course is designed to equip leaders with the tools and techniques needed to navigate complex organizational challenges, fostering innovation and inspiring teams for long-term growth.Learning Outcomes:Develop key leadership competencies to influence and inspire.Learn strategies to manage change and foster innovation.Strengthen decision-making capabilities in dynamic environments.Course Content:Introduction to Leadership DevelopmentDefining leadership in today’s contextExploring core leadership skills

Title: Basics of Communication Skills
Short Description: Enhance workplace communication
Full Description: Enhance workplace communication Overview:This interactive online workshop aims to enhance workplace communication by equipping participants with foundational and applied skills. Through engaging activities and discussions, participants will learn to overcome barriers, build rapport, and effectively communicate in team settings.Learning Outcomes:Understand the fundamentals and importance of communication in personal and professional settings.Develop active listening skills and the ability to provide constructive feedback.Learn strategies for conflict resolution and persuasive communication.Enhance team dynamics through effective communication practices.Course Content:Day 1: Foundation of CommunicationCh 1: Introduction to CommunicationCh 2: Types of CommunicationCh 3: Barriers to Effective CommunicationCh 4: The Art of Active ListeningCh 5: Wrap-up and ReviewDay 2: Applied Communication SkillsCh 6: Communication in Teams and GroupsCh 7: Feedback and Constructive CriticismCh 8: Conflict Resolution through CommunicationCh 9: Persuasion and InfluenceCh 10: Final Review and Evaluation

Title: The Entrepreneurial Why Workshop
Short Description: Help aspiring entrepreneurs discover their core motivations
Full Description: Help aspiring entrepreneurs discover their core motivations Overview:This workshop is designed to help aspiring and current entrepreneurs discover their core motivations and align their business goals with personal values. Participants will explore the importance of purpose in entrepreneurship and how to leverage it to build resilient and impactful ventures.Learning Outcomes:Understand the significance of defining a personal and business “why.”Explore how purpose influences entrepreneurial decisions and outcomes.Identify personal values and align them with business goals.Develop strategies for staying motivated and resilient during challenges.Course Content:Ch 1: Introduction to the Entrepreneurial WhyCh 2: Exploring Personal and Business PurposeCh 3: Aligning Values with Business GoalsCh 4: Staying Motivated Through ChallengesCh 5: Leveraging Purpose for Business Resilience

Title: Appreciative Inquiry
Short Description: Performance improvement method with teams
Full Description: Performance improvement method with teams Overview:The course gives participants everything they need to start using Appreciative Inquiry as a group coaching and performance improvement method with teams and small groups – with practical pointers for scaling up the method for larger groups and organizational change.Although the course gives participants as much theory as they need to understand how Appreciative Inquiry works, the emphasis is very much on practical, hands-on learning.Appreciative Inquiry is an approach to change that focuses on strengths and doing more of what works, rather than focusing on problems and who is to blame. It engages the collective wisdom of all stakeholders in deciding how to bring change about, and rapidly builds trust between different areas and different levels in the organization. If you want to reduce blame, backbiting, and mistrust in your team, and you want better communication between departments and more staff engagement, being able to use positive change methods is vital.If you are involved in change management or organizational development and you want to implement a more flexible, appreciative and strengths-based culture within your team or organization, you need to know about the Appreciative Inquiry method for rapid, participative change.The emphasis of this engaging, hands-on course is very much on practical, hands-on learning. By the end of this course, participants will be able to start using positive change methods for organizational change, teambuilding and individual coaching and development.Learning Outcomes:Understand and be able to apply the principles of Appreciative InquiryBe able to structure a team coaching session to improve engagement, communication, and effectivenessKnow how to quickly build trust to get diverse groups talking freely to each otherHave a format for engaging stakeholders in collaborating on creating a shared visionKnow how to unleash the creativity of team members to generate new ideasBe able to take a team from vision to action plan in less than two hours, with an engaging, participative method that involves the whole teamCourse Content:Pre-study: Understanding the origins and principles of Appreciative InquiryIntro to Appreciative InquiryThe neuroscience of Appreciative InquiryPrinciples of Appreciative InquiryThe 5-D format (Definition, Discover, Dream, Design, and Delivery/ Destiny).Ch 1: The Definition StageCh 2: The Discovery StageCh 3: The Dream StageCh 4: The Design StageCh 5: The Delivery Stage, when to use Appreciative Inquiry, Implementation Formats
